titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 352) to postpone the DTV transition date.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-11, by Mr. Cardoza.

Rule provides for consideration of S. 352 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 8.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 108.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/3/2009--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (S. 352) to postpone the DTV transition date.
